channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 5:05 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Zaporizhia region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 5:05 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Zaporizhia region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Запоризька_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 17:05 Attention! Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Zaporizhia region
item.description: 🟡 17:05 Attention! Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Zaporizhia region#Polohiv_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 15:59 ATTENTION !!! Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs).
item.description: 🟠 15:59 ATTENTION !!! Threat of using guided aerial bombs (UABs). #Pologivskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 15:05 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!

item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291
